attributes.action: Have Bulgaria & Romania thrown out of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Have Bulgaria & Romania thrown out of the EU. I think everyone knows that coruption is rife in these countries and we need to ask ourselves if we really want this here. Aside from this, there are enough eastern european imigrants here with out being beseiged by that lot! I wonder how many EU entry rules were relaxed to allow them to qualify??
